name: Alodimus
description:
ALODIMUS

A download APK for android this is, proof of concept version of the game. So it doesn't have much stuff. But I will update to add more features in the future.

CONTROLS

Touch And Hold Left to go Left

Touch And Hold Right to go Right

Touch And Hold Both side to go Up.

But be careful the controls are really sensitive.

GAMEPLAY Try to stay on the screen as the Jet is constantly falling, Avoid other jets and bullets if you touch them then it's game over.

It's has an arcade style score based gameplay. Try to beat your previous HighScore in every round.
